1.title: Twitch Con Recap and Bit Bit Blocks
1.plot: Erika and Sonja recap their experiences from TwitchCon 2016, review the latest in gaming and tech news, Geek and Sundry EIC Rob Manuel previews Dishonored 2, and we welcome Greg Matha from Bit Bit Blocks.

2.title: Cosmic Trip and a Surprise Guest Host!
2.plot: Pamela Horton fills in for Erika Ishii on this edition of Game Engine, and they discuss all things Cosmic Trip, a "groovy VR-native first-person real-time strategy game, playable with the HTC Vive."

3.title: Indiecade and Critical Path
3.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid discuss Indiecade and all of its offerings, then David Grabius and Anne Edgar from Critical Path join the show to talk about their project.

4.title: The Nintendo Switch Announcement
4.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid sit down and talk about the new Nintendo Switch.

5.title: Mass Effect, No Man's Sky, and the Uncharted Movie
5.plot: It's a game. It's an engine. It's a game engine.

6.title: BlizzCon, Mass Effect, and Riot: Civil Unrest!
6.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid talk BlizzCon and Overwatch's Sombra reveal, Mass Effect, and sit down with the developer of Riot: Civil Unrest to play and discuss the game.

7.title: Watch Dogs 2 and Overwatch Patch
7.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid talk the new Watch Dogs 2, Black Friday, and play Overwatch with the newly released patch that includes Sombra, new gametypes, and more.

8.title: Master X Master, Gaming News, and More!
8.plot: This gaming and tech news show features plenty of audience interaction, special guests from the gaming and tech worlds and insightful coverage of all the hottest tabletop and video games. Hosted by Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid.

9.title: The Game Awards, PlayStation Experience, and PuzzleQuest!
9.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid talk about The Game Awards and PlayStation Experience, and play PuzzleQuest.

10.title: 2016 in Review
10.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonya Reid discuss the best video games and trailers of 2016, play PuzzleQuest, and more.

11.title: First Game Engine of 2017
11.plot: Erika and Sonja present the latest news in gaming and technology while interacting with the audience's input. Developers, gamers, and others in the games industry join our hosts to experience the hottest tabletop and video games.

12.title: Game Engine with Jessica and Marisha
12.plot: On this special edition of Game Engine, we've got a whole new cast. Jessica Chobot, Marisha Ray, and Ryan Green sit in for Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid. Topics include Monopoly, VR, and more.

13.title: Geneva Hodgson's Tattletail, and a Resident Evil VHS
13.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonya Reid talk award shows, watch a mysterious Resident Evil VHS, and sit down with Geneva Hodgson to talk her new game, Tattletail.

14.title: Read Only Memories
14.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid sit down to chat the latest in gaming. Then, Matt Conn, an author at MidBoss, joins to talk and play Read Only Memories.

15.title: Rachel Sala and Frog Fractions 2
15.plot: Erika Ishii, Sonja Reid, and Ryan Green are here for Game Engine. The three talk the latest in gaming and are joined by Frog Fractions 2 designer, Rachel Sala.

16.title: Overwatch Updates and Magisterium
16.plot: Sonja Reid and Erika Ishii present Game Engine. This week, they discuss the new Overwatch updates and chat with Magisterium's devs while playing a demo for the game.

17.title: Valentine's Day and Surrendered!
17.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid talk the latest in gaming news on Game Engine. Then they play a demo of Sundered while chatting with one of the developers, Will Dubé.

18.title: Castlevania and Habitica!
18.plot: Sonja Reid, Erika Ishii, and Ryon Green talk Castlevania, PewDiePie, and more, and sit down with the creator of Habitica, Siena Leslie.

19.title: Horizon Zero Dawn with HavanaRama
19.plot: Erika Ishii and HavanaRama sit down to talk the latest in gaming, and unbox and play the special edition of Horizon Zero Dawn.

20.title: Overwatch and 1-2-Switch
20.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid discuss Erika's birthday (!!!), Overwatch's new hero, and play One Two Switch.

21.title: PAX and Hero Forge
21.plot: Sonja Reid and Erika Ishii present Game Engine. Sonja Reid relays her experience from PAX East, and the two talk Hero Forge.

22.title: Mass Effect: Andromeda
22.plot: Sonja Reid and Erika Ishii sit down to play the all new Mass Effect: Andromeda.

23.title: Thimbleweek Park
23.plot: Our hosts welcome a special guest this week on Game Engine.

24.title: Bamboozles, Review Everything, April Day!
24.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid talk Agents of Mayhem, April fools bamboozles, and Everything with David O'Reilly.

25.title: Oculus VR
25.plot: Erika and Sonja enter VIRTUAL REALITY as they try out the Oculus Rift on today's Game Engine.

26.title: Kismet
26.plot: Erika is joined by Havana Mahoney this week to try the VR experience Kismet, and talk to the developer.

27.title: What Remains of Edith Finch
27.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid present Game Engine. The two play What Remains of Edith Finch with the creative director of Giant Sparrow, Ian Dallas.

28.title: StarBlood Arena with WhiteMoon Dreams
28.plot: Welcome to Game Engine with Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid. Today they'll be playing StarBlood Arena with the Playstation VR, joined by Dave and Matt from WhiteMoon Dreams.

29.title: Injustice 2 with Taliesin Jaffe
29.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid are joined by Taliesin Jaffe for Game Engine. Taliesin kicks it off with a major announcement, then the three play Injustice 2.

30.title: Pinstripe with Thomas Brush
30.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid talk the Overwatch anniversary event and are joined by Thomas Brush to talk Pinstripe - An Adventure Through Hell.

31.title: Strafe with Thom Glunt
31.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid are joined by Thom Glunt to discuss and play Strafe, the roguelike FPS from Pixel Titans.

32.title: Sprint Vector VR
32.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid are dressed up as the 80s to do jazzercise and play the virtual reality game Sprint Vector with Dan, Chris, Hunter, and Rico of Survios.

33.title: E3 News with Ryann Lynn Weller
33.plot: Erika Ishii is joined by Ryann Lynn Weller to talk his Extra Life charity streams and all the news from E3.

34.title: Hangin' Out with Justin Roiland
34.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid are joined by Justin Roiland, the co-creator of Rick and Morty. They hang out, answer questions from chat, and discuss Squanchtendo Games.

35.title: Girl Talk with Ryan Green
35.plot: Erika Ishii and Sonja Reid get together for their last episode together because Sonja Reid is moving on from the co-host position. :( The two play Girl Talk with guest Ryan Green.

1.title: Season 2 with Trisha Hershberger!
1.plot: Game Engine is back for season 2 with an all new guest host, Trisha Hershberger. Erika Ishii and Trisha discuss Dream Daddy, an interview with the creators of the game, and Overwatch's Doomfist.

2.title: Skyrim Necromancer
2.plot: Erika and Trisha present the latest news in gaming and technology while interacting with the audience's input. Developers, gamers, and others in the games industry join our hosts to experience the hottest tabletop and video games.

3.title: Castlevania with Adi Shankar
3.plot: Trish Hershberger and Erika Ishii talk the new Ready Player One trailer and discuss Castlevania with producer Adi Shankar. Plus, Trish attempts to speedrun Castlevania 2.

4.title: Voice Acting with Courtenay Taylor and Kal-El Bogdanove
4.plot: Erika Ishii and Trisha Hershberger talk video game writing, acting, voiceovers, and more with Courtenay Taylor and Kal-El Bogdanove.

5.title: Grave Chase
5.plot: This gaming and tech news show features plenty of audience interaction, special guests from the gaming and tech worlds and insightful coverage of all the hottest tabletop and video games. Hosted by Erika Iishi and Trisha Hershberger.

6.title: Agents of Mayhem and Jack Box!
6.plot: Erika Ishii and Trish Hershberger talk Agents of Mayhem with Darin De Paul and play Jack Box with the audience.

7.title: Nidhogg 2 and Kung Fu Connect
7.plot: Erika Ishii and Trisha Hershberger are back for Game Engine. The two discuss Kung Fu Connect, play Nidhogg 2 with the developers, and more.

8.title: Overwatch with Chris Allen
8.plot: Erika Ishii and Trish Hershberger welcome you to Game Engine. This week they discuss Overwatch and esports with Chris Allen.

9.title: Dream Daddy with Jessica Chobot
9.plot: This gaming and tech news show features plenty of audience interaction, special guests from the gaming and tech worlds and insightful coverage of all the hottest tabletop and video games. Hosted by Erika Iishi and Trisha Hershberger.

10.title: LEGO Star Wars with Anthony Carboni
